title: Hovenweep National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Hovenweep Visitor Center NPS/Sheena Harper   Â    Hovenweep is open year-round. Visitor center hours change with the season.    Dates Visitor Center Hours    October 8 am - 5 pm    November - March 8 am - 4 pm   April 8 am - 5 pm    May - September 8 am - 6 pm     Hours may vary depending on staffing and holidays. The visitor center is closed on Thanksgiving, December 25, and January 1. Trails are open from sunrise to sunset.
